title: Ward skin missing
body: I was playing on my smurf account lvl 12 (ET0) on NA. Recently I bought 2 Hextec bundle at 195RP with the 400RP we get from the level 3 reward. I get the Bouquet ward skin and decide to pay the dust for it to be permanant. I join a game, pick my champion etc etc, remember that I forged the ward and decide to use it but there is only the "default" skin and nothing else. Is it still linked to my account or did I just spent 390 RP down the drain?

replies.body: There's a visual issue right now for some ward skins not being selectable.  They are still unlocked on the account, though!  We'll be providing updates on this on the [service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hope that helps!
What if we lost the ability to change ward skins altogether? i.e. the button in champion select is just not there anymore...I'm on Win 10

It's a bug that is happening to a lot of players where you can't see some wards but they are still on the account.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
